name: Chicken Hot
description:
The floor is griddle!

In Chicken Hot, play as a chicken leg trying to survive on a pipping hot griddle!

Jump on vegetables to avoid being burned, collect breadcrumbs.

But above all, BEWARE OF THE COOK!

Controls

Arrows Keys / ZQSD - Move

Space - Jump

Made in 2 Days for a Game Jam in the school Pôle IIID, following the theme "Tiny World"!
Credits Game Design : Programming : Art :Nicolas GruszeckiIris Pecquet
Antoine FoucaultNaomie Halter
Julien Dennemont
Padre Moisan
